name: Red Hood
text:
It's totally okay!
The fire brigade's job isn't just at the scene of the fire. For example—

name: Boogeyman
text:
—Today, the fire brigade
has come to our school.

name: Boogeyman
text:
Things to do when a fire breaks out at school,
and things to do to prevent a fire from breaking out.

name: Boogeyman
text:
Everyone, please learn well.
...Now, please begin.

name: Gurangatch
text:
Nice to meet you, everyone in the elementary division.
Today, I'll teach you about fire prevention that you all can do—

name: Red Hood
text:
And how to use a fire extinguisher in case of a fire,
and how to escape from a fire! It's nice to meet you all!!

name: Gurangatch
text:
Hmm...?
Why is everyone so nervous?

name: Red Hood
text:
...Could it be,
that we look scary?

name: Red Hood
text:
Right...
At that time, because of this... scary face—

options.text: To me, you're a beautiful wolf.

name: Cinderella
text:
Hey, Reddy!
You're getting off topic!!

name: Cinderella
text:
...Our Tokyo Firefighting Academy also does disaster prevention guidance
and so-called enlightenment activities for middle and high schools and local governments.

name: Cinderella
text:
So, if you're not good at sports, I'd like you to be in charge of
creating enlightenment posters and materials for lectures.

And just like so, [Player] ended up
helping with the public relations activities.

While [Player] was training hard,
at a certain skyscraper in Roppongi—

name: Gyumao
text:
—The remodeling is going smoothly!
The wonderful ideas from Oscar-kun can also be mostly realized.

name: Hakumen
text:
The Tokyo Bandits Leisure Resort grand remodeling plan...
It seems that my eyes were not mistaken
in inviting you as our worldview and art supervisor.

name: Oscar
text:
I'm glad to have met your expectations!
So, shall we move on to the next stage?

name: Gyumao
text:
Of course!
The first thing we need to do is to ensure the safety measures.

name: Gyumao
text:
We need to be especially cautious for the reopening day.
First, arrange for each guide staff and first aid. And then—

name: Hakumen
text:
For the crazy plan of having fireworks underground,
we'll need to request cooperation from the police and the fire department...
Something like that.

name: Oscar
text:
Regarding the safety measures for the fireworks,
I've already made some progress on my end.
Such as my duty as the proposer.

name: Oscar
text:
I just sent a love call
a little while ago.

name: Gyumao
text:
Wonderful. Then for security,
I'll consult the person I trust the most.

name: Hakumen
text:
For first aid, I know a suitable acquaintance.
...I very much dislike having to ask them myself, but it's the business that matters.

name: Shennong
text:
—A theme park reopening ceremony, huh.
They want me to come as a first aid personnel during the summer vacation season.

name: Shennong
text:
Good grief, it's not as bad of a request as a certain someone's,
but they're still pretty demanding, aren't they?

name: Shennong
text:
...Well, if I'm needed, I'll go.
They seem to have prepared a proper reward. ...Hmm?

name: Shennong
text:
A special pair admission ticket as a staff benefit...
I wonder if I have anyone I can invite.

Shennong looked at his app's contact list and thought of his friends
and acquaintances one by one. And it was narrowed down to one person.

name: Shennong
text:
As my gratitudes for always pestering me,
I'll be the one to invite them—

name: Shennong
text:
—Oh,
a reply already... Wait.

name: Shennong
text:
—Already been called?
And as a member of the fire brigade, no less...!?

That was just a little before
Shennong received the request—

When [Player] had finished their first day of joining,
and was preparing for the welcome party.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Sorry to keep you all waiting.
A request came in all of a sudden.

name: Gurangatch
text:
Huh, a request at this time of year...?
Could it be a new event, or something?

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Yeah, something like that. They want us to come as part of the disaster prevention
personnel for a theme park that's about to be reopened.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
I think it would be a good experience for [Player]-chan,
but what do you all think?

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
I agree with that, but Baatar-senpai,
you just want to have a vacation without working!

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
You know me so well, Akiha-chan!
Well, as they say, you have to let your cute juniors travel.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
It seems like we can get all sorts of benefits,
so I don't think it's a bad idea, even with work involved.

name: Cinderella
text:
Hm? Does that mean it's just the three of us?
I don't mind, if it comes down to it, I can do it alone.

name: Red Hood
text:
Don't be a wet blanket, Sandra. I'm fine with it too~.
Then, what about you, [Player]?

options.text: Well, if there's something in it for me.

name: Gurangatch
text:
Hey, hey, don't rush, it's not just the three of you~
It seems like a pretty big place, so we'll need a few more people, right?

name: Gurangatch
text:
So, advance team, please depart~
I'll catch up with you later.

name: Hogen
text:
Hum hum hum hum~♪
Is there anything you haven't done this summer~♪

Humming an old-fashioned song,
the police academy instructor, Hogen, was skipping down the hallway.

name: Tajikarao
text:
Um, Instructor Hogen. I hope you're not thinking
of the case you were called for as a vacation—

name: Hogen
text:
I know, Tajikarao.
But it's not like we'll be working non-stop, right?

name: Hogen
text:
We won't be on guard duty the whole time.
I'll just enjoy my time off, so don't worry.

name: Hogen
text:
Besides, the fire brigade called in as disaster prevention personnel,
has [Player] as a member, doesn't it?

name: Hogen
text:
Guhuhu...! It looks like I'll be able to have
a fun vacation for the first time in ever... Hmm?

name: Hogen
text:
...Cinderella?
Is that person coming to the same site as us!?
